entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: GC.RefreshMemoryLimit #70601
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make RateLimitPartition.Factory public #70597
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 5 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #70590
    7.0.0
  • Publish single file blazer server for osx-arm64 executable segfaults #70588
    6.0.x
  • Utf8JsonReader.TryGetDateTime throws IndexOutOfRangeException #70584
  • JIT should inline and avoid boxing for Enum.ToString() #70577
    Future
  • Tar API PR accidentally reverted another PR #70575
  • csISO2022JP/EUC-JP encoding doesn't return JIS X 0212 characters #70573
  • [Wasm][Threading] `garray.c:226: assertion 'array != NULL' failed` #70572
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm][Threading] Task.Delay only continues after a GC #70571
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed '(h->bbJumpKind == BBJ_COND) && (h->bbNext == loop.lpEntry)' during 'Clone loops' #70569
    7.0.0
  • [Mono-Arm64] Improved application throughput performance implementing hardware specific optimizations #70562
    7.0.0
  • [Mono-Arm64] Create smaller mobile applications by refactoring code #70561
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DirectoryEntry.Exists with authentication credentials #70559
  • Arm64 improvements for Mono #70558
    7.0.0
  • Reading the property "EnableBroadcast" on a "System.Net.Sockets.Socket" throws an exception and closes the socket #70555
  • Will await Task.Yield() be optimized away? #70579
  • JIT ARM32: LSRA does not kill R2R indirection cell reg on calls using it #70552
    8.0.0
  • win-arm64 NativeAOT CI job frequently times out in PRs #70549
  • Test `ClientOptions_TargetHostNull_OK` is failing on Android #70548
  • JsonSerializer does not support parsing DateTime value '0001-01-01T00:00:00+01:00' #70547
    Future
  • Crossgen2 crashes on linux-x64 #70543
  • SIGSEGV Coredump From Interop Debugging In VSCode #70541
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Move EFCore's IndentedStringBuilder to System.Text #70540
  • Top used controls from the major control vendors work well on ARM64 #70536
    7.0.0
  • Top Microsoft and third party NuGet packages support and work well on ARM64 #70535
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(intrinsic == NI_Vector128_As) || ...' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256:Dot(System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256`1[Vector`1],System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector256`1[Vector`1]):System.Numerics.Vector`1[Single]' #65814
    7.0.0
  • C# application referencing /clr:netcore creating its own static instances #64905
  • All TE benchmarks regressed on ARM64 #65272
    7.0.0
  • FilteredByLevel_InsideScope benchmark has regressed #59267
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IGetDebuggerDisplay #70426
  • Test `System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.LocalTzIsNotUtc` is failing on Android #70482
    7.0.0
  • Dead code after switch over int64 influences result #68568
    7.0.0
  • [Mono][WASM][Interp] System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms is not supported on WASM #56814
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!parentStruct->lvUndoneStructPromotion' during 'Mark local vars' #61074
    7.0.0
  • Host Test failures in rolling CI #69114
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 5:18:40 PM #70032
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 12:57:05 PM #70021
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 5:18:40 PM #70019
    7.0.0
  • [Perf][Mono] Regression on Serailizer Benchmarks Changes at 5/20/2022 2:58:35 PM #70219
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_UInt64 #69143
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` - AOT/v8 #70304
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Linq.Tests` - AOT/Linux/v8 #70303
  • [Mono WASM] CoreCLR tests on WASM: Interop tests failed due to lack of support on WASM #41519
    7.0.0
  • Don't build if used any of not supported API #38476
    Future
  • [browser][wasm] The target "GetCopyToPublishDirectoryItems" does not exist in the project #37152
    Future
  • System.Tests.Perf_Version.Parse2 has regressed on Unix #65193
    7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Prepare for the future #69887
    7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] DeserializeAsyncEnumerable is delayed emitting objects when writing asynchronously to stream #70107
    7.0.0
  • GZipStream.ReadByte 10x slower than on Desktop #39233
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Drawing.Tests.Perf_Color #59999
    7.0.0
  • Missing command-line-api repo reference in eng/Version.Details.xml #42637
    7.0.0
  • System.Uri regression in .NET 7 #70443
  • JIT: AssertProp propagates const vector back to loop body #70355
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject can be reentrant on NativeAOT and deadlock #70453
  • Complex architecture using DI scoped service #70415
  • Error in load assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=4.0.4.1' #68023

PullRequests

Created

  • Windows/Arm64: Set flag for Atomics/Dp feature #70600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1818534 #70596
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Enable some previously failing WBT/AOT tests on windows #70595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable previously failing tests - System.IO.FileSystem #70594
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO
  • ConfigurationBinder.Bind on virtual properties duplicates elements #70592
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #70591
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • Skip X.509 extension copies where possible #70589
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: relax fwd sub restriction on changing class handle #70587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update MetricEventSourceTests.cs #70586
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Add doc on Unix temporary file security practice #70585
    area-System.Security
  • Remove some more unnecessary pragma warning disables #70583
    area-Meta
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cross module r2r rebased #70581
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable CSE for CLS/STR const handles #70580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • [mono] A few more PowerPC cleanups #70576
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Draft] Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in a few more places #70568
    area-Meta
  • Enable IDE0054 (Use compound assignment) #70564
    area-Meta
  • Do not use ExecutableMemoryAllocator on 64 bit platforms if default base address usage is requested #70563
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove some arm64 hwintrinsic asserts #70557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Propagate c++ unhandled exception to previous handler #70556
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Precisely track reflected on fields #70546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold System.Private.Reflection.Core into CoreLib #70545
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix emitDispJumpList for Arm64 #70542
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt #70539
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #70537
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Obsolete AssemblyName.CodeBase, AssemblyName.EscapedCodeBase #70534
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • [release/6.0][iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70288
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.7
  • Detect inlining accurately and skip generating precode fixups for inlines that do not succeed #70379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for parsing and working with CustomModifiers in field signatures and make TypeSystemMetadataEmitter more flexible #70593
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the compiling error for #69041. #70544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mono Code Guidelines #70507
    documentation, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Fix failing LocalTzIsNotUtc test #70485
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [6.0] Switch the ClientPre Helix queues to Client #70570
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid discarding upper bits when folding GT_SWITCH #69986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move a morph opt to post-order #69984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move analyzer and fixer tests into FuncionalTests project #70406
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove Android crypto internals from System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates tests #70554
    area-System.Security
  • Bump xharness to latest version #70566
    area-codeflow
  • Remove unnecessary CS8601 suppression from SSPIHandleCache.cs #70565
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use Stream.CopyToAsync in OCSP download on Linux #70567
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] add support to build for ppc64le architecture #68802
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable should not wait until buffer is filled. #70430
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Updating the various generic math functions to have default implementations #70445
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #69956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix typo (clr.dll -> mscordacwks.dll) #70550
    area-Meta
  • Increase timeout for ARM64 testing #70551
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0029 (Use coalesce expression) #70506
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Do not propagate some constants #70378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add disasm comments for field data addresses and code addresses #70437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0036 (Modifers are not ordered) #70502
    area-Meta
  • Remove params byte[] from System.Net.Mail #70513
    area-System.Net
  • Remove unnecessary CA1052 suppressions #70512
    area-Meta
  • Avoid calling into resource manager from the type loader #70538
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] prevent reentering CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject #70456
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Add a 'wasm-gc-safepoints' option to enable the generati… #70520
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][nodejs] Ensure that stdout/stderr have been flushed out before exiting #70416
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add basic testing infrastructure in NativeAOT (port from dotnet/linker) #70408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Modify thread pool thread counting to be a bit more defensive #70479
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.7
  • ARM64 - Always morph GT_MOD #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Forbid creating layout-less `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #70170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add a build lane for FreeBSD Mono. #69715
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #70299
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fixed a bug in DFA to NFA mode alternative branch generator #70464
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Remove narrow cast if the actual type sizes are the same #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Enable a subset of the gc_pin area optimizations. #70465
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable C4244 in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • add architecture enum PPC64le #68809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-author-action, arch-ppc64le
  • ppc64le build support #68806
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Updating usages of `IntPtr`/`UIntPtr` to be the language keyword `nint`/`nuint` now that they are equivalent #70297
    area-Meta
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Investigate helix error return #70238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add DeleteFromJsonAsync extension for HttpClient #65619
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid throwing Win32Exception from HTTP authentication #70474
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize expansion of indir cell addresses for CFG #70491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0020 (Use pattern matching) #70523
    area-Meta
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #70522
    area-Meta
